name: ikth-counter-v7-webpack-dockercompose-jsrouter-2022
description: js / webpack / docker-compose / js router / mongodb / mongoose

scripts.ikupdate: npm i && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm outdated
scripts.build: eslint . && rm -rfv ./dist && mkdir dist && cp -rv ./src/config/iKmanifestDir/ ./dist/ && webpack --config webpack.production.config.js
scripts.dev: eslint . && rm -rfv ./dist && mkdir dist && cp -rv ./src/config/iKmanifestDir ./dist && webpack serve --config webpack.dev.config.js --hot
scripts.ikclean: rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json dist/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm run ikupdate && npm run dev
